Title: Timeline
Writer: Michael Crichton (novel), Jeff Maguire (screenplay), George Nolfi (screenplay)
Actors: Paul Walker, Frances O'Connor, Gerard Butler, Billy Connolly
Plot: A group of archaeologists become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve a friend. The group must survive in fourteenth century France before they can escape back to the twenty-first century.
Production: Artists Production Group, Mutual Film Company, Donners' Company, Paramount Pictures, Cobalt Media Group
